name: Full-Time Baby Sitting

description: Our full-time babysitters provide feeding, bathing, sleeping routines, and playtime supervision for infants and toddlers.

name: Part-Time Baby Care
shortDescription: Short-term baby care for working parents.
description: Ideal for parents who need baby care support for a few hours during the day or evening.

name: Newborn Care
description: Professional caregivers trained to handle newborn feeding, hygiene, sleep routines, and health monitoring.

name: Daily Elderly Assistance
description: Assistance with daily activities including walking, eating, medication reminders, and companionship.

name: 24/7 Elderly Home Care
shortDescription: Round-the-clock care for elderly family members.
description: Continuous monitoring and care to ensure safety, comfort, and medical attention when needed.

name: Post-Hospital Elderly Care
shortDescription: Care for seniors after hospital discharge.
description: Recovery assistance, medicine follow-ups, and daily health check-ups for elderly patients at home.

name: Emergency Home Nurse
description: Quick-response trained nurses for sudden illness, injury, or urgent medical needs.

name: Patient Monitoring Service
description: Monitoring of vital signs such as blood pressure, oxygen level, and heart rate at home.

name: Ambulance Assistance
shortDescription: Emergency ambulance support with trained staff.
description: Quick ambulance service with medical support to transfer patients safely to hospitals.

name: Night-Time Baby Care
shortDescription: Overnight baby care for newborns and infants.

name: Baby Tutor & Activity Care
description: Caregivers engage babies and toddlers with educational activities, storytelling, and creative play.

name: Elderly Companionship Service
shortDescription: Emotional support and companionship for seniors.
description: Focused on reducing loneliness by providing friendly conversation, walking support, and daily interaction.

name: Elderly Physiotherapy Support
description: Trained caregivers assist elderly patients with light physiotherapy exercises as advised by doctors.

name: Post-Surgery Home Care

name: ICU-Level Home Monitoring
